snippet: A West Hollywood lawyer was declared brain dead just days after friends described him as fit and healthy, raising fears of an outbreak like one in New York that killed 7.
abstract: Potentially deadly strain of meningitis, which has left one resident brain dead, sends shiver through large gay community in West Hollywood, Calif, as public health officials urge residents to be on lookout for any symptoms of disease.
lead_paragraph: A West Hollywood lawyer was declared brain dead just days after friends described him as fit and healthy, raising fears of an outbreak like one in New York that killed 7.

headline.seo: After Meningitis Case in Los Angeles, Gay Activists Urge Vigilance
headline.main: On Alert for Meningitis in Los Angeles
headline.print_headline: On Alert for Meningitis in Los Angeles
